sentences.sContent: I was, as you rightly said , the smallest boy in the class.
sentences.sCn: 你说的没错，我是班级里最小的男孩。

sentences.sContent: As you so rightly pointed out , things are getting worse.
sentences.sCn: 你说得很对，情况越来越不妙了。

sentences.sContent: They have been treated badly, and they are rightly upset.
sentences.sCn: 他们受到了不公正的对待，生气是理所当然的。

sentences.sContent: This photo was taken in Paris, if I remember rightly .
sentences.sCn: 如果我没记错的话，这张照片是在巴黎拍的。

synos.tran: 正确地；恰当地；公正地；合适地

phrases.pCn: [多用作插入语]且不管对还是错

words.tran: 合法的；正当的；公正的；正直的

trans.tranCn: 正确地；恰当地；公正地；合适地
trans.tranOther: correctly, or for a good reason
